info.name: 4Chan Google+ April Fools Basic Theme
info.description: The 4Chan Google+ Theme originally uploaded by badjokr slightly edited to fit my autism. Features posts on the left, reduced buffer size between posts, a light blue background and blue buttons.
info.additionalInfo:
Original belongs to badjokr, I take no ownership of his/her/xe's work.

Original can be found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/126275/4chan-google-theme-april-fools-2016-theme
